name: Donkey Kong Banana Kingdom
overview: Donkey Kong Banana Kingdom is a medal game based on the Nintendo GameCube game Donkey Kong: Jungle Beat. It is based primarily on a slot machine mechanic. The goal is to get as many tokens as possible through the slot machine and various minigames based on Donkey Kong: Jungle Beat's gameplay. Up to six players can play at once, as there are six stations with a monitor at each.
